original_text: If you do these bad things, I will push you out of Canaan's land. I will send you away, like the people before you. If you do these bad things, I will push you out of Canaan's land. I will send you away, like the people before you.
korean_text: 너희도 더럽히면 그 땅이 너희가 있기 전 주민을 토함 같이 너희를 토할까 하노라

sentences.original_text: If you do these bad things
I will push you out of Canaan's land
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 가나안 땅에서 내쫓을 것이다

I will push you out of Canaan's land
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 가나안 땅에서 내쫓을 것이다
